runbooks.name: Mint Diko
runbooks.description: This runbook uses your browser wallet to sign and broadcast a transaction calling the arkadiko-alex-dual-yield-v1-1 contract's mint-diko function.

runbooks.name: Governance
runbooks.description: This runbook uses your browser wallet to sign and broadcast a transaction calling the arkadiko-governance-v4-2 contract's propose function with AIP 15 arguments.

runbooks.name: Simple Contract Call
runbooks.description: This runbook uses your browser wallet to sign and broadcast the example-fruit-vote-contract contract's vote function.
